subjectArea.name: CX - Campaign Opportunity Revenue Line
subjectArea.description: The data is sourced from CX Sales and this subject area provides ability to report on Campaign and the associated Opportunities with their revenue lines. Because it connects Campaign to Opportunity Revenue, it can be used to report on Campaign, Campaign Cost, Campaign Cost at an Opportunity Revenue Line, Campaign Cost and Associated Revenue and hence the Campaign ROI as well.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Closed Loop Analytics
subjectArea.implicitFactColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Campaign Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Opportunity Revenue Lines
